channel.title: Need help with the npc's following when attacked
channel.description:
it is cheezscape 78 i have and i was wondering if anyone knew how to make it so the npc's dont follow you forever or even when your dead !!
i was wondering if someone could make it so they follow you for about 10 squares or when you die they stop following?
please could someone do this ...

item.title: Need help with the npc's following when attacked
item.dc:creator: @cappy cappy
item.description:
@cappy wrote:

ill upload my npchandler, it worked for me a hellou, make a backup of your current one and replace with this, and take the 3 off the end of it

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with the npc's following when attacked
